Package dev.majek.advancements.shared

Class ItemObject

java.lang.Object
dev.majek.advancements.shared.SharedObject
dev.majek.advancements.shared.ItemObject
public class ItemObject extends SharedObject
Specifies information about an item. Apart from triggers, also used to specify the icon of advancements. If this item object acts as an icon, the item's type must be specified (and mustn't be null): item(Material). For icons only the data and item properties have effect.
